item.title: Highly-available Microsoft Remote Desktop Services Farm diagram
item.description: I stood up my first Microsoft Remote Desktop Services several months ago, with a great deal of help from TheWolfBlog’s great guide. One thing I didn’t have when I started my work was a good illustration of how the final highly-available infrastructure would look. I’ve included an image of a sample setup below, and I hope it benefits someone. In the image below, the firewalls represent load balancers.
